org.codehaus.griffon.runtime.hibernate5.internal

Class HibernateConfigurationHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.codehaus.griffon.runtime.hibernate5.internal.HibernateConfigurationHelper

  • public class HibernateConfigurationHelper
extends Object
    Sets up a shared Hibernate SessionFactory. Based on Spring's org.springframework.orm.hibernate5.LocalSessionFactoryBean Original author: Juergen Hoeller (Spring 1.2)
    Author:
    Andres Almiray
